info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:14PM MDT until June 06 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA AND NORTHERN BENT COUNTIES... At 514 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Haswell to 7 miles northeast of Las Animas to near John Martin Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, McClave, Blue Lake, Hasty, Arlington, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
